translation: Hello, everyone.
transcript: 各位听众,大家上午好!

translation: I'm a doctor working on reproductive and genetic science.
transcript: 我是生殖和遗传从事生殖和遗传的医生。

translation: I'm 79-year-old.
transcript: 我常年啊我今年已经79岁了。

translation: It's my dream, also my father's, to allow each couple to have a healthy baby.
transcript: 那么在我的一生中，我们的理我和我的父亲的理想，就是要让每一个人，啊每一对夫妇生育健康的孩子。

translation: You might assume that rare disease only occur rarely as the name has suggested.
transcript: 罕见病虽然听它名字是“罕见”。

translation: However, there are a great variety of rare diseases.
transcript: 但实际上罕见病它的种类相当多。

translation: The Human Gene Mutation Database now contains 220,000 kinds of mutations involving over 8,000 monogenic diseases.
transcript: 现在国际人类基因组突变库里面数据库里面，已经发现了八千多种这个单基因病的突变，里面它们有22万种突变。

translation: So actually many people suffer from rare diseases, and rare diseases are not rare at all when we look at the number of infected patients.
transcript: 那这大家可以想象，这是非常多的人群会要得这个病，如果把他们的总数加起来，就不叫罕见就不罕见了。

translation: There is a private research center for rare diseases in China and it has collected over 147 monogenic diseases in our country.
transcript: 我们中国的一个民间的机构，就是罕见病的这个研究发展中心，它们收收录了大概147种在我们国家的单基因病。

translation: I have over 30 years' clinical experience on reproductive and genetic science, and we have discovered over 212 monogenic diseases.
transcript: 但是在我从事这个将近三十多年的临床作遗传临床中间，我们已经收集到了212种单基病。

translation: However, there are a total of 8,000 monogenic diseases in the world, so I would say China is still in its early stage on rare disease research.
transcript: 但是距离世界上的那个八千多种还有很多，那就说明我们国家在遗传罕见病的上面是啊在起步。

translation: As a matter of fact, around 80% of the rare diseases are genetic, which are caused by genetic mutation or chromosomal mutations.
transcript: 啊罕见病实际上主要80%的它是属于遗传性疾病，实际上就是基因突变或者是染色体的突变。

translation: Once the disease starts to develop, it is a chronic process and lift-threatening.
transcript: 一旦它发病了，它就是一个慢性过程，而且嗯危害人的生命。

translation: There isn't any cure yet and early prevention so far is the most effective method.
transcript: 非常严重，目前是没有法办法去根治的，预防是它最有效的方法。

translation: How can we prevent rare diseases?
transcript: 那么呃我们呃怎么去去预防这种罕见病？

translation: It is the doctors' obligation to help each couple have a healthy baby, and you can take a picture here, which explains one of our interference approach to tackle rare diseases.
transcript: 作为一个医生来说，我怎么要让病人呃让我的啊我的这些夫妇们能生出健康的孩子，啊这里是一个罕见病的这个一个干干扰的干涉的啊我们干扰的途径。

translation: First of all, if a rare disease is found in a family, then people should visit our genetic counseling clinic, and our genetic counselors will write down the family history for three generations.
transcript: 首先呢，如果家族里面发现了有罕见病，那么他就要到遗传咨询门诊来进行遗传咨询，我们遗传咨询医生会跟他把家系写出来，三代。

translation: We must have a clear idea of you family's medical conditions within three generations to see if there have had any similar conditions.
transcript: 所以你们呀看病一定要把三代的情况搞清楚，在你祖孙三代里面有没有这样的同样的情况。

translation: Then, in line with your symptoms and the patterns of inheritance in your family, we can identify the most likely genetic mutation that you might have.
transcript: 然后根据你的症状，根据你这个家系的遗传方式，我们确定可能你是哪种基因突变。

translation: For example, Mr. Huang we have seen just now is a patient carrying an achondroplasia-prone gene.
transcript: 譬如说啊像这样我们刚刚这个黄老师，他是一个假性啊这个软骨发育不全的基因。

translation: This gene has now been cloned.
transcript: 啊那么这个基因已经克隆出来了。

translation: In the last century we had identified this gene, which had many exons, but the early manual cloning process was very troublesome, and we needed to clone these exons one by one.
transcript: 以前的方法，就上个世纪我们就是把这个基因拉出来，它有多少外显子，一个个克隆出来，啊人工地去做，非常的麻烦。

translation: However, with the completion of the HGP (Human Genome Project), a large-scale gene sequencing can be made possible, including the genome-wide exon sequencing.
transcript: 但是现在的人类基因组计划完成以后，有一啊有大规模的测序，比如说人呃那个全基因组外显子测序。

translation: The cost for this screening is not expensive at all, and the screening will help you detect any genetic mutation among over 20,000 genes of monogenic diseases.
transcript: 现在价格也不贵，啊就能够做一个它就可以把你两万多种单基因病能单基因把它检测出来，里面有没有基因突变。

translation: The screening result is very helpful to our genetic counselors.
transcript: 这样呢也给我们提示啊这个信息，让我们的遗传咨询医生照着这个路。

translation: We will do a similar screening to confirm the result.
transcript: 再给你检测。

translation: At present there are two preventive methods.
transcript: 那么现在预防的方法，目前主要是两种。

translation: The first one is prenatal diagnosis.
transcript: 第一种就说做产前诊断。

translation: So, when you are pregnant, and someone in your family has some medical conditions.
transcript: 啊你怀了这个宝宝，我家里又有这个病。

translation: I can help you do a prenatal diagnosis, including amniocentesis and percutaneous umbilical cord blood sampling, by doing so we can check the health status of the fetus.
transcript: 那我来做产前诊断，抽羊水、啊抽脐静脉血，我看这个宝宝有没有问题。

translation: If the fetus doesn't carry any cancerous gene, then you could be relieved and carry on with your pregnancy.
transcript: 没有，不带这个基因，那我就放心地生。

translation: But if the fetus does carry the gene, it is certain that the baby will get sick and the disease can be fatal.
transcript: 如果带着这个基因的话，他一定发病，而且很严重。

translation: In that case, an induced labor or abortion might be an option.
transcript: 那我会考虑各种方式，或者我是引产或者是流产。

translation: We believe that this method is rather passive.
transcript: 啊所以我们认为这种方法是一种啊消极的方法，我怀一个，很被动。

translation: You do the checkup only when you're pregnant, and the result will lead you two options only, either to keep the baby or to have an abortion.
transcript: 我怀一个做一个检查，你没有问题就生，有问题就流。

translation: But now, with the availability of in-vitro fertilization (IVF) technology, we can carry out a large number of pre-pregnancy diagnosis, and this is a positive approach.
transcript: 但是呢现在呢试管婴儿的技术的基础上，啊这个事情我们开展了大量的妊前诊断，啊这个是个积极的。

translation: I will give you a brief introduction to prenatal diagnosis.
transcript: 下面跟大家介绍一下这个产前诊断啊。

translation: Take a look at this couple.
transcript: 这个呃这个这个图呢就是一对夫妇。

translation: This woman carries a Hemophilia-A gene, and this disease is X-linked.
transcript: 这个女女方她是呃甲型血友病的呃基因的携带者，这个病是X连锁的。

translation: In other words, if she is having a girl then the baby will be fine although she carries the disease; if she is having a boy then the baby will certainly develop the disease.
transcript: 女孩不发病，但是女孩可以携带，就是男孩可以发病。

translation: So this woman came to us.
transcript: 那么她到我们这里。

translation: She already gave birth to a baby girl, who carried a Hemophilia-A gene.
transcript: 她生了第一个女孩，这个女孩是携带了她的甲型血友病的啊第八因子这个基因突变。

translation: She is now pregnant, and she wants to find out whether the fetus is OK.
transcript: 她现在肚里怀一个，她就想看这个孩子有没有。

translation: We then did her an amniocentesis, and the result told us that the fetus did carry the same gene.
transcript: 那我们跟她做了这个羊水穿刺，一做，发现这个孩子啊是带了这个基因。

translation: We offered her a number of options.
transcript: 我们会给她几种选择啊。

translation: If the fetus had this mutant gene, were it a girl, would you want her or not, as she could still live normal; but were it a buy, he would certainly develop the rare disease.
transcript: 如果你带了这个突变基因，如果是女孩你要不要，啊她还可以正常，但是如果是男孩，这个孩子就会发病，一定会发病。

translation: We later did a gender screening, and found out that it was a boy.
transcript: 所以后来呢我们又跟她做了这个性别的诊断，发现这个是一个男孩。

translation: We told her the situation, informing her that her baby would certainly have the rare disease.
transcript: 所以当时我们告诉她啊你这个这个孩子呃他会发病。

translation: It was her call, either to accept a baby with a congenital medical conditon or choose an abortion.
transcript: 啊你看她愿呃你们愿不愿意接受这样的孩子，不愿意接受你可以采取流产。

translation: She decided to terminate the pregnancy at the time, and when she was ready to have another baby, she went to us for a pre-pregnancy diagnosis.
transcript: 她当时就采取了终止妊娠，她准备下一个再生的时候，到我们那里做妊前诊断。

translation: This is a picture of pre-pregnancy diagnosis.
transcript: 这个就是一个妊前诊断的图。

translation: We can tell that it is test-tube baby in its 5th or 6th day.
transcript: 啊我们大家看到的，这是一个第四五天到第六天的试管婴儿。

translation: It is the process that we all need to go through.
transcript: 啊大家看到，你们都是从这个过程来的。

translation: We first make a hole in the eggshell, so that cells within the hole will come out.
transcript: 我们先在这个蛋壳上面打了一个洞，人的蛋壳上打了一个洞，那么这里面的细胞就凸出来了。

translation: We then use a very tiny straw to suck out three to five cells, as you know there is a negative pressure.
transcript: 然后我们用一个很细的吸管，啊一个负压，去吸出三到五个细胞。

translation: We then send the cells for genetic diagnosis.
transcript: 啊吸三到五个细胞，这三到五个细胞呢我们就送去做基因诊断。

translation: As you could see, we have already identified the disease-prone gene, so we can make a genetic diagnosis of the embryo.
transcript: 你知道，我们已经确定你是哪个基因，那我们就可以对这个胚胎进行基因诊断。

translation: If the embryo doesn't carry the gene, then we'll give it to you.
transcript: 如果这个胚胎它不带有这个基因，那我们就给你了。

translation: Take the case we just talked about as an example, when the women is ready to have a new baby, we will help her perform this genetic diagnosis.
transcript: 譬如说像我们刚才讲的这个病例，啊我们刚才讲的这个病例呢，啊她将来再做的时候，那我们就要跟她做这个基因诊断。

translation: This method works very well.
transcript: 这个方法非常好。

translation: Although this disease is X-linked, half of the boys will be normal while the other half will get sick.
transcript: 因为男孩子虽然是X连锁的，但是男孩子里面有二分之一的男孩是正常的，有二分之一的男孩是发病的。

translation: We were unable to do a genetic diagnosis in the last century, so we did gender screening instead.
transcript: 那过去我们上个世纪不能做基因诊断，那我们就做的性别。

translation: However, this gender diagnosis is unfair.
transcript: 那么这个性别诊断是很不公平。

translation: Half of the boys that are normal don't have the chance to be born, but half of the girls, despite that they are carriers of the disease-prone gene, are born and continue to pass on the disease-prone gene.
transcript: 有那个二分之一的男孩正常男孩不能出生；二分之一的女孩携带了这个基因，我们让她出来了，而且的话呢让她继续把这个不良基因传下去。

translation: So this pre-implantation genetic diagnosis is a positive diagnosis, but it has to be based on advanced IVF technology.
transcript: 所以这个植入前的遗传学诊断是一个积极的诊断，但是它必须要有非常好的试管婴儿技术。

translation: This is another example.
transcript: 这里一个例子。

translation: You might find this picture scary, but it is a very common tumor in pediatrics.
transcript: 大家看了这个图好像很可怕，但实际上在儿科里面，儿科的肿瘤里面，它发病率还是比较高的。

translation: It is called retinoblastoma.
transcript: 我们叫视网膜母细胞瘤。

translation: When still inside his mother's womb, the fetus started having canceration in its retina.
transcript: 他可能这个孩子在他妈妈啊在子宫里面的时候，他就开始眼睛的视网膜就开始发生那个癌变。

translation: The onset of the disease happens very early.
transcript: 啊一般发病都非常早。

translation: In this case, the subject developed the disease when she was only two years old, you can see that her eyeball began to stick out.
transcript: 我们这个病例呢她两岁的时候出生两岁就已经发病了，啊，这个眼球都已经开始鼓出来。

translation: Lucky her family was able to access high-quality medical service and had her eyeball removed, so the canceration didn't transfer to other parts of her body and she survived.
transcript: 啊她幸好当时在那里条件比较好，她就做了眼球摘除，比较早地摘掉了，摘掉了让她活下来没有转移。

translation: She got married at the age of 36 and was pregnant with a natural pregnancy.
transcript: 在她36岁的时候她结婚了，结婚了以后她怀的第一个是自然怀孕。

translation: We helped perform the amniocentesis and discovered that the fetus was carrying the genetic mutation for retinoblastoma.
transcript: 怀孕以后她做啊这个羊水穿刺，发现这个孩子啊携带了这个视网膜母细胞瘤的这个基因突变。

translation: So she chose to have an abortion.
transcript: 所以她做了人流。

translation: She later came to us for genetic diagnosis.
transcript: 接下来就到我们这里来做这个基因诊断。

translation: There were four available embryos, of which only one of the four test-tube babies had no cancerous genes, therefore we chose to plant the healthy embryo into her body.
transcript: 啊做基因诊断的时候呢，那我们发现呃这个她其实当时可以诊断的有四个胚胎，这四个试管婴儿里面其中只有一个没有带癌基因，那我们就把这个没带癌基因这个胚胎给她移进去。

translation: She later gave birth to a healthy baby.
transcript: 就生出了一个宝宝，健康的宝宝。

translation: And, of course, we later did a prenatal diagnosis and confirmed that the baby didn't carry the carcinogenic genes.
transcript: 啊当然我们还要做产前诊断，最后确定她确实不带这个癌基因。

translation: This is our country's first cancer-free baby, born in 2015.
transcript: 这就是我们国家的啊第一个无癌宝宝，一五年诞生的。

translation: How is the latest progress of this technology in China?
transcript: 那么现在这个这种方法在我们呃国家到底进行得怎么样？

translation: Last year, Nature, an elite academic journal in the world, published an article entitled "China Push For The Better Baby".
transcript: 啊这里就去年呃Nature，是国际的顶尖的啊就《自然》杂志，他们写的一篇文章，啊 China push for the better baby。

translation: This article gave an introduction of our hospital, and I am a doctor from Reproductive and Genetic Hospital of CITIC-Xiangya.
transcript: 就啊这里特别对我们医院啊进行了介绍，我是中信湘雅的。

translation: Till the year when the article was published on Nature, we handled more than 41,000 IVF cases, of which over 2,540 cases involved the diagnosis of rare diseases.
transcript: 啊那么我们医院呢啊在那一年它报道的那一年，我们做了41000多个试管婴儿周期，其中呢呃这个这种就是说罕见病的诊断我们做了两千呃四呃两千五百四十多个。

translation: You know what, these 2,540 cases performed in our hospital in one year accounted for one-fourth of the number in the US.
transcript: 那么这个呢就是说我们一年做的量，啊全年的量是美国全年的四分之一。

translation: As of now, we have handled nearly 9,000 cases involving the diagnosis of rare diseases, of which over 2,000 babies were born and 1,200 still in their mothers' wombs, the rest are still being frozen in the embryo bank.
transcript: 啊到现在为止我们已经做了9000多个啊这样的呃这样的一呃呃呃宝宝，但是呢现在出生了两千多个，还有一千二百个在怀孕中，啊另外还有一部分还没有移，还冻在胚胎库里面。

translation: That is to say, after the continuous hard work by scientists for so many years, China is now in the forefront position on this research in the world.
transcript: 啊说明我们中国这这么多年，我们的科学家努力在这个领域里面我们做到了世界的前沿。

translation: We can look at a new case.
transcript: 这个呢是另外一个啊。

translation: Multiple osteochondroma is a disease that will grow tumors everywhere in the body, anywhere with cartilage; and it has to be removed by a medical surgery.
transcript: 呃这个多发性骨软骨瘤，就是说她的肿瘤到处长，只要有软骨的地方就会长，长了她就手术切掉。

translation: This woman, with a multiple osteochondroma-prone gene, originally didn't plan to have a baby.
transcript: 她原来不准备生孩子了。

translation: She later came to us upon learning about the gene-editing program in our hospital.
transcript: 后来呢就是听说我们这里可以做这个癌基因的删除，所以到我们这里来做。

translation: She has given birth to a healthy baby, and is ready to have a second child.
transcript: 她也诞生了一个宝宝，啊她这个宝宝呢现在啊也长得很健康，她还准备生第二胎。

translation: You know cancer has the second highest mortality rate in China.
transcript: 大家知道肿瘤现在在我们国家是第二第二大啊死亡率最高的，是吧。

translation: Lung cancer is the cancer with the highest morbidity rate in China, followed by gastric colon cancer and breast and ovarian cancer.
transcript: 那么这个里面呢最主呃最常见的我们中国第一发病率高的是啊肺癌，第二发病率高的是胃结肠癌，第三个呢就是乳腺癌和卵巢癌。

translation: Now, I would like to tell you a story about Angelina Julie.
transcript: 啊这里呢我们介绍一个就是茱莉，安吉利娜的故事。

translation: She is now widely regarded as a brave cancer fighter.
transcript: 啊因为为什么我介绍她，因为她是现在大家认为她是抗癌斗士。

translation: After undergoing a genetic diagnosis, one of the most important discovery in the last century, she was aware that she was the carrier of BRCA1 and BRCA2, the genes of breast cancer.
transcript: 她把她的基因诊断，本来这个是上个世纪人类很重要的发现，发现了乳腺癌的基因，BRCA1、BRCA2。

translation: Her great grandmother, her mother and her aunt were all breast cancer patients, and both her great grandmother and her mother died in a painful way.
transcript: 她呢，因为她的外外婆、她的妈她的妈妈、她的姨妈都是乳腺癌，她的外婆和妈妈很痛苦地死亡。

translation: Her aunt was still alive at that time, and by applying the latest technology at that time, she did a genetic screening of cancer and found out that she carried breast cancer genes.
transcript: 她的姨妈当时还在，她就利用了当初的科研成果，她就做了这个癌症的基因筛查，结果发现她自己携带了这个啊癌症的基因。

translation: Angelina Julie decided to remove both of her breasts, before the age of 40, it was a sort of preventive surgical resection.
transcript: 所以她当时毅然地决定在30岁的啊三呃没有到40岁以前，她把她的两个乳房都切掉了，这个叫做预防性的手术切除。

translation: She even plans to remove her ovaries by the age of 50, as BRCA1 gene can cause breast and ovarian cancer.
transcript: 她还准备到50岁左右再把卵巢切掉，因为这个基因BRCA1 基因可以引起乳腺癌和卵巢癌。

translation: But she didn't wait that long.
transcript: 但是啊她没有等到50岁。

translation: Several years later, she developed ovarian lesions and had her ovaries removed.
transcript: 后来我们最终她大概没有过几年就发现卵巢有病变，所以卵巢也切掉了。

translation: She's still alive and in good health, because of the preventive surgical resection.
transcript: 啊所以她现在还很健康地活着，因为她没有发病以前她就预防性地切掉了。

translation: But unfortunately her aunt developed the breast cancer prior to the release of the cancer genetic screening report, and she soon passed away.
transcript: 但是她的姨妈啊诊断也诊断出来以后已经发癌了，所以她就后来去世了。

translation: Julie's story tells us that genetic tumor might be a rare disease, but it is not rare at all within a family.
transcript: 所以让茱莉的故事让我们知道就是说罕见病，肿瘤的遗传性肿瘤是罕见的，但是在一个家庭里面它不是罕见的。

translation: So, if there is someone in your family has bowel cancer before the age of 30 or 50 and someone in his family within three generations had cancers, or two of your siblings have the same cancer, you need to be highly suspicious that it might be a genetic tumor and the disease is caused by a cancerous gene.
transcript: 如果你家族里面有一个人在30呃50岁以前得了结肠癌，呃不得了癌症，同时的话呢在她的家族里面三代人里面有多个人得不同的癌症，或者是啊你们的同胞姐妹、兄弟之间有两个人同时得了同一种癌，你就要高度地怀疑这个是一个遗传性的肿瘤，你就要来寻找这个肿瘤是不是啊这个癌症呃这个癌细癌癌基因是不是有突变。

translation: If the cancer is caused by gene mutation, then it is very likely that 50% of your offspring's will carry the same cancer gene, and 85% of your offspring's with the gene will have cancer in their lives.
transcript: 啊如果有突变的话，因为啊家族里面如果有一个人我我是携带这个基因，那我在我的后代里面有50%的后代会要携带这个基因，那么这个50%的后代在未来的那么多年中，85%的会要发癌。

translation: This story therefore remind us of the importance of prevention and control of genetic tumors.
transcript: 啊所以的话呢她这个故事也提醒我们，就是说我们能够对遗传性的肿瘤进行防控。

translation: We launched a program last year, by offering free screening for cancer patients.
transcript: 我们去年搞了一个节目，就是说啊为癌症的病人免费你做这个检测。

translation: There was a 72-year-old man suffering from breast cancer.
transcript: 有个72岁的老头子啊他得了乳腺癌。

translation: You might find it odd that how can a man will have breast cancer, as breast cancer is widely believed to be a female exclusive disease; but it is not.
transcript: 大家说乳腺癌是女性的专利，不是的，男性同样得癌。

translation: Our screening found out that there was a BRCA1 gene mutation.
transcript: 啊他就主动到我们这里来做检测，这个一检测发现他是BRCA1基因突变。

translation: Then all his other family members went through the same screening.
transcript: 所以后来他的家族里面都进行了这个检测。

translation: We told them that at least 50% of them should have regular health examination.
transcript: 那我们就告诉他查出来的这个50%的家族里面你们应该定期做检查。

translation: That would include regular breast examination and ovarian examination.
transcript: 啊定期做乳腺的检查，啊定期去做卵巢的检查。

translation: Like myself, my elder sister passed away because of colon cancer before the age of 50.
transcript: 啊像我自己，我的姐姐她就是呃在50岁以前得了结肠癌去世了。

translation: I knew that I was a high-risk patient myself, as she was so young when passing away.
transcript: 啊那我就知道我是一个高危的病人，因为她很年轻嘛。

translation: At that time there wasn't any cancer gene screening available.
transcript: 那么我，在那个时候还没有癌基因检测。

translation: When I turned 50 years old, I decided to have an enteroscopy checkup each year.
transcript: 我就每年50岁的时候啊我就开始做肠镜，我每年做一次肠镜。

translation: When I was near 70 years old, I was diagnosed with colon polyps and I had them all removed in time; when I was 76 years old, I was diagnosed with adenoid tumor, I immediately had it removed as well.
transcript: 做到我60岁的时候啊快七呃呃接近70岁的时候发现了有结肠息肉，有一个摘一个有一个摘一个，那是但是到我这个76岁的时候发现了结肠这个这个呃腺瘤，啊我也发现了就马上摘掉。

translation: I will have this kind of physical examination once every year.
transcript: 啊每年做一次。

translation: You see, colon cancer is a chronic process, but it is also a high-risk disease in China with a relatively high death rate, and that is why I will keep doing the health checkup for a long time.
transcript: 啊因为结肠癌是一个慢性过程，这个在我们中国也是高发的，死亡率也很高，啊所以我这么长的时间在对自己做健康检查。

translation: The reason why I can still live heathily is largely due to my constant attention to the development of cancer and regular health examinations.
transcript: 所以的话呢，我觉得到现在我还啊还嗯还很好地活着，身体非常健康，我觉得这对我自己重视这个癌症的发病的过程，我定期检查是非常重要的。

translation: Rare diseases and inherited cancers are basically the same, they are all monogenic disease, so how can we prevent and treat these diseases?
transcript: 啊那么罕见病我们和癌症的遗传性癌症都是同一种疾病，都是罕见的，都是单基因病，啊那么它的防和治我们怎么去做？

translation: I'm a specialist working on assisted reproductive technology, and therefore it is my dream.
transcript: 那么下面呢啊因为我是做这个啊辅助生殖技术的，那么我们把自己设想了一个啊一个未来的希望。

translation: I think that it is my responsibility to help you have a healthy baby.
transcript: 就是说首先我们应该帮你怀啊帮你怀一个好的孩子。

translation: I want to make this message clear to our female friends.
transcript: 在这里我要特别提醒妇女同胞们。

translation: The period between 35 and 45 is regarded as the climacteric stage, the period between 45 and 50 is the premenopausal stage, the period between 50 and 55 is menopause, while the 55 or above is regarded as the old age.
transcript: 我告诉你们35岁到四十维45岁是更年期，啊那么45岁到50岁是经绝前期，50岁到55岁是绝经了，55岁就是老年期。

translation: Youth is gone forever, just like me, I'm an old woman now.
transcript: 青春一去不复返，就像我自己，我已经早就是老年了。

translation: For women, we are infertile for at least one third of our time in our lives.
transcript: 在我们女人的一生中三分之一的时间我们是没有生育能力的。

translation: So, please don't come to me when you are over 40 years old, "Ms. Lu, I'm still young and in good health, and I want to have a baby."
transcript: 所以呢你不要等到40岁再到我这里来“啊卢老师啊，我现在很年轻啊，我身体很好啊，我还想生孩子。”

translation: Why?
transcript: 因为为什么？

translation: Because your ovaries are aging.
transcript: 你的卵巢老化了。

translation: It is best to give birth to a baby when you are 20 years old.
transcript: 啊20岁其实是最好的。

translation: When you are older, especially after 35 years old, the number of eggs and quality of ovaries decrease sharply, and the odds for having a baby with birth defects are on the rise.
transcript: 那么年龄慢慢下降，卵巢的数量、质量越来越低，到了35岁直线下降，那么你出生缺陷就会增多。

translation: China saw a rising number of preimplantation genetic diagnosis (PGD) and preimplantation genetic screening (PGS) in the year 2016, it was largely due to the rising number of older women wishing to have a baby.
transcript: 为什么在2016年我们中国做了很多的P就是说我们植入前的诊断PGD、PGS，就是因为大龄的来了。

translation: Many ensuing problems will occur, the number and quality of your eggs will decrease and risk of chromosomal disease is higher, such as trisomic syndrome.
transcript: 来了以后呢她们最大的问题：卵子数量减少，第二个质量减少，它不发生染色体的不分离，会有染色体病，譬如说染色体三体。

translation: Why do we need to screen Down syndrome?
transcript: 啊唐氏综合症为什么大家筛呀？

translation: It is something to do with advanced maternal age.
transcript: 唐氏综合症就是因为与大龄有关。

translation: I want to make this message clear, there should be an age limit for late marriage.
transcript: 啊所以呢一定，我说你们要明确什么叫晚婚，不是说无限制晚。

translation: At least you should have your first child before the age of 30, despite that you are busy with your work.
transcript: 啊希望在30岁以前，你再工作再忙你一定要啊就生第一个孩子。

translation: You can have your second child when you are 35, as China is implementing a two-child policy now.
transcript: 35岁以以前生第二个孩子，因为我们现在可以生两个嘛。

translation: By doing so, you can have two healthy babies.
transcript: 你这个孩子肯定是很健康的，啊。

translation: Apart from helping you give birth to a healthy baby, we also help you maintain your health by freezing sperm or eggs.
transcript: 啊同时的话呢，当然，我们啊除了帮你怀一个好孩子以外啊，另外的话呢我们储存你的健康。

translation: For example, we have the world's largest sperm bank in Hunan, also a very large egg bank and a frozen embryo bank.
transcript: 啊比如说呃我们有精子库，啊这个世界最大的精子库在我们湖南；啊还有一个很大的啊有卵子库；另外呢，我们有冷冻胚胎库。

translation: As of now we have frozen over 200,000 IVF embryos.
transcript: 现在我们冻成有20多万份胚胎，啊试管婴儿。

translation: China loosened its family planning policy in 2016, as a result, over 1000 couples required us to unfreeze the frozen embryo that they had stored in our frozen embryo bank, as they wanted to have a second child.
transcript: 一六年我们国家允许生第二胎以后，那那一段时间就有一千多对夫妇回来要求把他的储存在我们那里的冷冻胚胎解冻，帮助他生育二胎。

translation: So I think it is a good solution.
transcript: 啊所以我觉得这也是个好的办法。

translation: I know that it is a fashionable thing for women to freeze their eggs nowadays.
transcript: 啊但是呢我还是就譬如说啊包括冷冻卵子现在也很时髦，很多人去冷冻卵子。

translation: Some women are extremely busy with their work and remain single.
transcript: 但是我呢还是建议妇女，啊当然冷冻卵子如果是你工作很忙、你没有找到对象，是吧。

translation: They want to freeze their eggs for future use, and we can accept this kind of mentality.
transcript: 你来冷冻，我们接受。

translation: But other women are not willing to give birth to a baby for the fear of losing their slim body, they want to freeze their eggs and find a surrogate mother to use the frozen eggs in the future.
transcript: 啊但是你说为了我的漂亮、我要苗条、我要怎么样，啊我不愿意自己生，我要把我的卵子将来冻了给别人去生。

translation: I'm totally against this kind of practice.
transcript: 啊其实这种观点我是最不赞成。

translation: Xu Jinglei made headline news lately.
transcript: 啊大家当然徐静蕾不是大家也落报纸上也折腾了一段时间。

translation: I had no idea why she wanted to freeze her eggs.
transcript: 啊她在冷冻卵子，当然她的目的我不太清楚。

translation: I will encourage every woman to give birth to a baby of their own by themselves, through natural delivery.
transcript: 啊但我还是鼓励啊妇女一定要自己怀孩子。

translation: Only by doing so, you will become mature physically and mentally.
transcript: 而且一定要自然地分娩，啊你怀了孩子以后你才成熟，你才从身体上、从你的心理上成熟，你真正有爱。

translation: Prior to your pregnancy, you won't have this kind of maternal love.
transcript: 没有怀孕以前，啊她一般就是这种爱母爱不会出来。

translation: It is necessary for a woman to become a real woman through the pregnancy process, and her internal environment will have a major change.
transcript: 啊所以我觉得真正要成啊一个正常的女人，她要经历一个怀孕的过程，让自己的内环境发生改变。

translation: I don't agree with the DINK family either.
transcript: 啊我不赞成克丁家族。

translation: This is my opinion.
transcript: 啊这是我的观点。

translation: We also carry on researches on stem cells, and we have set up China's first national engineering center for human stem cells.
transcript: 另外的话呢我们现在有干细胞，啊因为啊我们得到拿到了国家的第一个人类干细胞国家工程中心。

translation: We store frozen stem cells.
transcript: 我们在做各种干细胞的冷冻。

translation: For example, we will store frozen embryos.
transcript: 譬如说啊这个胚胎。

translation: IVF is now a mature technology and we will use the ovulation induction treatment, in other words, sometimes we can have 20 to 30 eggs at a time, so in theory we can produce at least a dozen of embryos.
transcript: 像我们有条件就是试管婴儿是吧，它呃多余了，譬如我们有时候促排卵，它有时候可能有二三十个卵，它可能有十几个胚胎。

translation: But I can only give you up to two embryos, as China is now implementing a two-child policy.
transcript: 但我们一般只给你一两个，生两胎嘛，是吧。

translation: After you are pregnant, you can freeze your remaining embryos.
transcript: 一万一你怀孕以后剩余的胚胎你可以冻存。

translation: You might use these frozen embryos when necessary; or you can donate them for embryonic stem cell line research.
transcript: 啊你还可以就是说你万一有什么意外的时候还你可以用它，另外的话呢你如果不用，你可以捐出来建立干细胞系。

translation: Embryonic stem cell line can be very useful, and you might use it in your family.
transcript: 这种胚胎干细胞系将来可以做很多的，你家里面都可以受用。

translation: Say, your liver is damaged in the future, and we can induce the embryonic stem cell to produce a hepatic cell, which can be further implanted into your body.
transcript: 啊你将来肝脏坏了，我可以诱导成肝细胞给你移植。

translation: I am going to tell you another story, it is about a rare disease called hepatolenticular degeneration.
transcript: 啊下面我会要讲一个这个故事，就是啊肝豆状核变系啊变性。

translation: It is also a monogenic disease, and patients with this disease are unable to handle the copper metabolism.
transcript: 这是一种也是一种啊单基因病，也是一种罕见病，它是一个铜代谢的啊这样一个调备调整这个基因发生了突变。

translation: When there is such a gene mutation, copper accumulates in our body and will lead to brain disease or liver cirrhosis.
transcript: 发生突变以后，铜就累积在我们的身体里面，在脑子里面就得脑脑病，啊移在肝脏里面就肝脏就肝硬化。

translation: Take a look at this picture, you can notice that there is something surrounding the eyes, look at the arrow over there, and that is copper being accumulated there.
transcript: 啊它在眼睛里面，这是给大家看的一个眼睛，大家可以看到外面一圈那个箭头指的那一圈，就是铜啊累积在这里。

translation: After having this rare disease, the patients will eventually die from brain disease or liver disease.
transcript: 啊这种病他将来最后也是脑病死于脑病和死于肝病。

translation: The purpose of this story is tell you the significance of embryonic stem cell.
transcript: 但是呢，我呃举这个的例子的目的呢，就是要讲我们现在做人类胚胎干细胞，啊这个就是人类胚胎干细胞。

translation: For example, it can be used to treat liver failure.
transcript: 啊它可以治疗肝脏衰竭。

translation: We can use the embryonic stem cell as a form of targeted drug, which is effective to treat liver disease.
transcript: 啊另外嘞可以作为药物靶向，你要做肝病的，啊可以用这个这个诱导成的干细胞来治一个靶向。

translation: In addition, we can use the embryonic stem cell to produce a liver bud and later an organ, which can be used to treat the liver disease.
transcript: 另外的话呢，可以用形成的肝芽来形成一个器官，来治疗你这个病。

translation: Moreover, we can make an artificial liver with the embryonic stem cell.
transcript: 啊另外呢，可以做人工肝。

translation: We can produce a liver through the 3D printing technology, provided that we have applied the embryonic stem cell in inducing liver cells in the first place.
transcript: 啊就现在我们也在想用3D打印打印一个肝脏，用胚胎干细胞诱导分化成的干细胞啊来做成一个肝脏。

translation: It is not a far-away dream, as we have successfully induced the embryonic stem cell into liver cells.
transcript: 啊这个不是很遥远的，因为现在我们已经把人类胚胎干细胞很好地诱导成肝细胞。

translation: To be honest, the treatment mechanism for this rare metabolic disease is rather simple.
transcript: 啊，那么其实像这种病，这种呃罕见病，这种病，啊代谢的。

translation: We only need a tiny liver bud to be implanted into our body, and it will produce enzymes, so that copper metabolism can be made normal again.
transcript: 它只要有一个小的肝芽，我把它放到身体里去，它就可以把产生酶，就让铜代谢能够正常。

translation: To us that is a new approach to deal with rare diseases.
transcript: 所以我们将来期望罕见病，这是一个新的途径。

translation: We can use embryonic stem cell to induce the cells we want, so as to treat different diseases.
transcript: 将来能够利用人类胚胎干细胞来给他啊诱导的东西来给他治疗。

translation: To me, that is our future.
transcript: 啊这是未来的前景。

translation: Scientists are working in this direction.
transcript: 我们正在啊很多科学家都在朝这方面努努力。

translation: You can tell that I'm an old lady near to the age of 80.
transcript: 啊我呢啊是一个啊大家看到我现在快80岁了啊。

translation: I keep telling the significance of having a healthy lifestyle.
transcript: 呃因为我是呃我强调的生活方式就是说啊一定要有健康的生活方式。

translation: I personally also do physical exercise regularly.
transcript: 我一直坚持运动。

translation: You can take a look at this picture, that is me and my Beetle car.
transcript: 啊大家可以看到那里那个车，那个甲壳虫。

translation: Me and my Beetle have almost become a tourist attraction in Changsha, "An old lady is driving the car, please be considerate."
transcript: 这是我们长沙的一道风景线“老太太开车，请多多关照”。

translation: I learned how to drive when I was 69, but my students tried to persuade me, "Ms. Lu, please don't drive at your age, and the traffic condition is rather poor too."
transcript: 我69岁学开车，啊学到嗒嗒以后，我的我的那些学生们就讲：“卢老师，你这么大年纪不要开车，现在车况很不好。”

translation: I relied that what was the point of learning driving and having a driver license if I didn't drive.
transcript: 那我说，我学来开车干啥？我拿那个驾照啊去去呃去啊这个去显示，我说没一点价值。

translation: To me, driving is a sort of technique, and I feel great when I'm driving.
transcript: 因为我觉得开车对我来说是一个技术，而且我在开车的过程，感到心情非常愉悦。

translation: I have been driving for more than 10 years, with this little Beetle.
transcript: 啊现在呢我已经开了十年了，啊这个就是我那个小甲壳虫。

translation: I will drive my car to the hospital at 6 am each day, as I don't want to get stuck in the traffic.
transcript: 我每天早上清早开车开到医院里去，啊我大概一般是六点多钟就开车了，为了跟人家不去挤那个交通拥堵。

translation: After arriving at the hospital, I will do 100 times of sit-ups.
transcript: 开到医院以后，一百次仰卧起坐。

translation: I also spend time lifting dumbbells.
transcript: 啊，而且呢还做哑铃。

translation: You see, muscle can age rapidly when you are old.
transcript: 因为年纪大了嘛，就是这个肌肉很容易衰老。

translation: Our bones can break easily if we don't do enough physical exercises.
transcript: 啊骨头骨头断了其实就是没有运动。

translation: There is a calcium pump in our muscle.
transcript: 啊因为在肌肉里面有个钙泵。

translation: If your muscle is not strong enough, the pump won't transfer the calcium to the bone; and in that case it is useless in taking calcium tablets, it will only cause kidney stones in your body if you don't do exercise.
transcript: 你如果你拼命吃什么钙片啊那且你不运动，这个钙泵，你肌肉不强大它不会把钙打到骨头里面去，它会在血液里里面最后造成你的肾结石，是吧。

translation: So it is important to do exercise, especially for elderly people, and your upper limbs can easily shrink.
transcript: 所以一定要运动，尤其是老年人，你的上肢很容易萎缩。

translation: For example, I lift dumbbells.
transcript: 那我就哑铃。

translation: You can tell my muscle is as tough as the iron, and I'm an old lady that is almost 80.
transcript: 啊大家以后还可以跟我比一比，我的肌肉这个肌肉像铁一样的，这是80岁老太太的。

translation: Thank you.
transcript: 所以我非常，啊谢谢，嗯。

translation: You can take a look at this picture here, that is me playing a basketball game organized by my school when I was 76.
transcript: 你你看那那这这张图，是我在啊76岁的时候啊参加我们学校的那个篮球比赛。

translation: I think my physical condition is wonderful.
transcript: 啊篮球比赛，啊呃还可以吧，就说自己觉得身体。

translation: Actually I have a heavy workload, and a healthy lifestyle is very important to me.
transcript: 啊因为我现在的工作量非常的大，所以我特别强调就是健康的生活方式。

translation: I don't take any medication, and I only stick to a healthy lifestyle.
transcript: 我根本不吃什么药的，就是强调健康的生活方式。

translation: How do we live healthy?
transcript: 啊这个健康生活方式包括什么呢？

translation: First of all, you need to do exercise.
transcript: 第一个，要运动。

translation: I now spend at least one hour on doing exercise each day.
transcript: 我一天每天有一个小时的运动。

translation: I used to climb mountains a lot, and I even visited Tibet when I was 69 years old.
transcript: 啊我以前经常爬山，我到了大概是啊可能是六十六十九岁呃不对69岁的时候我还到了西藏。

translation: I didn't have any altitude sickness at all.
transcript: 我一点反应都没有。

translation: I climb mountain, I swim and do other forms of exercises.
transcript: 啊那么我一直是坚持运动，比如说爬山，啊这个各种各样的运动，游泳，这些坚持运动，啊。

translation: You know, rest breeds rust.
transcript: 第二个的话，因为生命在于运动。

translation: Secondly mind the food we eat, and we need to have a healthy diet.
transcript: 第二个的话呢，我坚持这个饮食的卫生，啊饮食的健康。

translation: China's Health Commission has announced a recommended healthy diet for Chinese people.
transcript: 我们卫计呃那个卫计委公布了一个我们中国人的饮食健康。

translation: I now eat over half-kilo of vegetables each day, including half of the green-leaf vegetables and another half of vegetables of different colors, you know, colored vegetables contain different essential microelements.
transcript: 我一天要吃一斤蔬菜，这一斤蔬菜呢50%是青叶子的，50%的是各种颜色的青菜，紫的红的蓝的绿的搭配，因为里面含有各种不同的微量元素。

translation: I have been doing this for so many years.
transcript: 啊我坚持了很多年。

translation: When I was 70 years old, they told me that I had diabetes, saying that "Ms. Lu, I won't give you any medicine at all, because you have the perseverance to do anything. You need to do exercise and have a healthy diet."
transcript: 在这个60呃70岁的时候他们跟我讲我有糖尿病，啊他们说卢老师我不给你用药了，因为你很有毅力做什么事情，他说你自己坚持运动、控制饮食。

translation: When I was 78 years old, they told me that "Ms. Lu, your diabetes is gone."
transcript: 到了78岁给我摘了帽，“卢老师，告诉你，你没有糖尿病了。”

translation: I was very happy about it, I didn't expect me to be that good at such an old age.
transcript: 我非常高兴，我没想到越老我心想越厉害。

translation: Doing exercise and having a healthy diet proved to work well with me, and I even shook off diabetes.
transcript: 没想到我这么多年的坚持运动和饮食的健康，啊让我最后糖尿病的帽子都摘摘下来了。

translation: I walk fast in the hospital, and I even climb stairs fast, much faster than those young people.
transcript: 我现在在医院里我跟要上班走路我都比我们年轻人走得快，我上楼梯都很快。

translation: I hope that everyone can live to their nineties, and stay in healthy in their seventies and eighties.
transcript: 啊我希望我们将来每一个人都能活到啊这个90多岁、啊70多80岁的时候你能有健康的身体。

translation: I wish that you can continue to think and learn new things, and have a high quality life to the end of your life.
transcript: 啊不断地能够思维，不断地学习能思维，快快乐乐、幸幸福福、健健康康，啊有高质量地生活到你生命的终结。

translation: Thank you.
transcript: 谢谢大家。
